attributes.action: Close the borders! Suspend ALL immigration for 5 years!
attributes.additional_details: We think we need a tougher approach. We believe we can’t even look after the people we have here at the moment.
attributes.background: We believe our country is facing serious challenges both from legal and illegal migration, and think the only way to deal with this is to suspend all immigration temporarily for 5 years.
